snippet: Mike Gesell hit a driving layup through contact for the go-ahead three-point play with 1 minute 16 seconds left, helping visiting Iowa beat No. 12 North Carolina, 60-55, on Wednesday night in the A.C.C./Big Ten Challenge.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; Iowa upsets North Carolina, 60-55, in the ACC/Big Ten Challenge; other men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Mike Gesell hit a driving layup through contact for the go-ahead three-point play with 1 minute 16 seconds left, helping visiting Iowa beat No. 12 North Carolina, 60-55, on Wednesday night in the A.C.C./Big Ten Challenge.

headline.main: Iowa’s Late 3-Point Play Upsets North Carolina
headline.print_headline: Iowa’s Late 3-Point Play Upsets North Carolina
